summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2279 for the improvement of Main Street, from Twenty-eighth Avenue South, from the North, to Thirtieth Avenue South, by paving the same with asphalt, laid upon a proper concrete foundation, by constructing armoured concrete curbs, and including as a part of said work, all necessary grading and regrading, the construction, alteration or extensions of all sewers and watermains with their appurtenances necessary for the proper drainage, sewerage, water service and fire protection of said district, under Ordinance No. 23446, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
